content:
Hi,
Currently we are trying to deploy zulip-docker images to my laptop. We have created SMTP server through sendgrid creds. But while running it, we're getting this error of SSL wrong Version number. We're using default settings for self signed certificate. processed-f3208eaf-8663-4435-9352-97495308f41c_10DRFgHR.jpeg
Hi, we were able to solve this issue - we were missing some SMTP configurations that was causing the error to be thrown.
Aniket Sinha has marked this topic as resolved.
